head.prefix: og: http://ogp.me/ns# fb: http://ogp.me/ns/fb# object: http://ogp.me/ns/object# article: http://ogp.me/ns/article# profile: http://ogp.me/ns/profile#

body.class: logged_in env-production macintosh vis-public fork page-blob

a.data-ga-click: Header, click, Nav menu - item:pulls context:user
Header, click, Nav menu - item:issues context:user
Header, go to profile, text:your profile
Header, go to starred repos, text:your stars

button.title: Unstar rajgoel/reveal.js
button.data-ga-click: Repository, click unstar button, action:blob#show; text:Unstar

button.title: Star rajgoel/reveal.js
button.data-ga-click: Repository, click star button, action:blob#show; text:Star
Repository, show fork modal, action:blob#show; text:Fork
button.title: Fork your own copy of rajgoel/reveal.js to your account
button.aria-label: Fork your own copy of rajgoel/reveal.js to your account

a.data-selected-links: repo_source repo_downloads repo_commits repo_releases repo_tags repo_branches /rajgoel/reveal.js/tree/animate

button.class: js-zeroclipboard btn btn-sm zeroclipboard-button tooltipped tooltipped-s

div.h2: Users who have contributed to this file

a.class: btn btn-sm tooltipped tooltipped tooltipped-n source
btn btn-sm tooltipped tooltipped-n rendered selected

a.aria-label: Open this file in GitHub Desktop

button.aria-label: Fork this project and edit the file
Fork this project and delete the file

div.div: Sorry, we cannot display this file.
Sorry, this file is invalid so it cannot be displayed.

body.div: Something went wrong with that request. Please try again.

div.class: js-stale-session-flash stale-session-flash flash flash-warn flash-banner hidden
div.span: You signed in with another tab or window. Reload to refresh your session.
You signed out in another tab or window. Reload to refresh your session.
